graph.elements
Interface Edge<N extends Node>

Type Parameters:
N - is the type of node to which the edge will connect, which can be of type Node or any of its subclasses
All Known Subinterfaces:
NamedEdge<N>, WeightedEdge<N>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicEdge, BasicNamedEdge, BasicWeightedEdge, NamedWeightedEdge
public interface Edge<N extends Node>

This interface specifies the properties of a basic graph edge that connects to two nodes. The edge is directed and starts at the source node and ends at the target node.

Since:
Mar 16, 2014
Author:
Mathieu LŽger
